mapper.select: SELECT RCBC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS BRANCH , RC.CAR_TYPE , RC.CAR_NAME , RC.CAR_FUEL , RC.COMPANY , RC.DELIVERY_DATE , RENTAL_ABLE_STATUS , DEFAULT_COST FROM RENTAL_CAR_BRANCHES_CAR RCBC, RENTAL_CAR_VIEW RC WHERE RCBC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER = RC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{branchCode}

SELECT RCBC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS BRANCH , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO AS BRANCH_CODE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_TYPE_CODE) AS CAR_TYPE , CAR_NAME , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_FUEL_CODE) AS CAR_FUEL , FN_COMM_NAME(COMPANY) AS COMPANY , DELIVERY_DATE , IMPORT_CAR_YN , RENTAL_ABLE_STATUS , DEFAULT_COST FROM RENTAL_CAR_BRANCHES_CAR RCBC, RENTAL_CAR_VIEW RC WHERE RCBC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER = RC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{branchCode} AND RENTAL_ABLE_STATUS = 'W'
